formulas.name: forNewClientTask
formulas.expression: IF( {!$Record.Account__r.VIP__c} = true, " VIP New Client Set Up", "New Client Set Up" )

formulas.name: forServiceName
formulas.expression: IF({!$Record.Opportunity__r.VIP__c}=true, "VIP " + {!$Record.Account__r.Name} + " - IDX Tool", IF({!$Record.Opportunity__r.Semi_Custom_Pod__c}=true, "SCP " + {!$Record.Account__r.Name} + " - IDX Tool", {!$Record.Account__r.Name} + " - IDX Tool"))

value.stringValue: Required: Please add or confirm the website domain on the onboarding service - {!$Record.Name} - to expedite IDX approval and/or SEO Migration Audit.

textTemplates.name: bodyReadyToLaunch
textTemplates.text: Website is being prepared to launch for {!$Record.Name} : https://luxurypresence.lightning.force.com/{!$Record.Id}

textTemplates.name: bodyRevisionEmail
textTemplates.text: Stage has been moved and team is working on it/ reviewing for {!$Record.Name}: https://luxurypresence.lightning.force.com/{!$Record.Id}

textTemplates.name: bodyWDReview
textTemplates.text:
Hi, {!$Record.Owner:User.FirstName}!


The Website Draft from your Client, {!$Record.Name}, is now ready for review! Please check the Service in Salesforce.
